content: Hello! This is the automated receptionist for XYZ Home Services. How can I help you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Buy cheap meds now! Visit our site for deals!!!
It seems like your message is not related to our home services. We do not provide any medical or unrelated products. If you need help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services, please let me know.
Lowest prices on meds online!!! Click here!!!!
Your messages appear to be spam. We will have to end this conversation. Thank you.
reason: Customer sent promotional spam messages unrelated to home services
